original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary: US imposes sanctions on ICC officials for pursuing cases against American soldiers and Israeli officials, including Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. The ICC, which is not a party to the US or Israel, condemns the sanctions as an attack on its independence. Meanwhile, Italian police arrest a Ukrainian man suspected of involvement in the bombing of the Nord Stream gas pipelines in 2022. The man is believed to have led a unit responsible for blowing up sections of the pipelines.</s>
